Description:
Secluded and spacious contemporary style
In a tranquil mews setting close to hectares of Yarra parkland, schools, cafes and station, this immaculate residence offers secure low-maintenance living. Set over three light-filled levels and immaculately presented, here is city-fringe living at its stylish best! A versatile floor plan comprises two double bedrooms with luxurious ensuites and 3rd BR/study; generous living and dining areas flowing through multifolds to private balconies; bespoke central kitchen (Miele appliances, stone benchtops, pantries); third bathroom and concealed laundry. Including a large internal-entry garage, this elegant home features polished bamboo floors, custom storage, split-system air conditioning and solar HWS.
Insights: 12 Barries Place, Clifton Hill VIC 3068 was last sold in 2017 and 25 other 3 bedroom house in Clifton Hill have recently been sold.

Description:
Superbly positioned with genuine period character
What a warm welcome is offered by this wider than normal (approx. 7 metres), semi-detached Victorian residence, immaculately presented with Baltic floors and ceilings throughout. Close to neighbourhood cafes, Clifton Hill station, schools and Yarra parkland, this updated period home offers an inviting living environment with two double bedrooms (BIRs) and a generously proportioned central living room with gas log fire & French doors opening to a side light court. Set to the rear is a stylish bathroom/laundry, spacious dining room and an elegant family-sized kitchen with solid timber cabinetry (Porter & Charles dual ovens) opening to a tranquil stone-walled courtyard shaded by a spreading Callistemon tree, providing the perfect spot for year-round entertaining (ROW access). Other features include large loft storage, central heating and ceiling fans. Move in and immediately & take advantage of this terrific home and wonderful inner-city lifestyle that has been enjoyed by the current owner for the past 40 years! Nelson Alexander Pty Ltd.
Insights: 21 Groom Street, Clifton Hill VIC 3068 was last sold in 2017 and 16 other 2 bedroom house in Clifton Hill have recently been sold.

Description:
Stunning factory conversion with panoramic CBD views
Authentic industrial detail complements smart modern style in this stunning 2-level apartment in a former button factory, tucked away in an elevated street close to Clifton Hill station, Village cafes, schools and Yarra parkland. Take a grandstand seat on the wide balcony or in its spacious rooms to watch the fireworks or enjoy the view over Studley Park! Entered through a luxuriant courtyard, this appealing residence, with light and views from two sides, comprises an expansive living/dining room open to a well-equipped kitchen (granite benchtops, pantry and quality appliances); two double bedrooms with soaring ceilings; a stylish bathroom/laundry (spa bath and shower) and powder room. Including secure, undercover parking and intercom, this historic apartment features original brickwork and beams, storage, gas heating and split-system air conditioning.
Insights: 9/41 Dally Street, Clifton Hill VIC 3068 was last sold in 2017 and 21 other 2 bedroom unit in Clifton Hill have recently been sold.

Description:
Prime Position with Perfect Potential!
In a truly outstanding city-fringe location virtually surrounded by parkland, this neat single-front period home occupies an oversized block of land (approx 307sqm) providing a world of opportunities to renovate, extend or possibly develop with approved planning permit for 2 townhouses already in place. First time offered in over 40 years, the home's current floorplan includes two large bedrooms, bathroom and separate WC, wide central lounge through to the kitchen and adjoining meals area. Step outside to discover a substantial north-facing backyard with extensive brick paving and garage/workshop via excellent ROW. Moments from Quarries Park and Merri Creek trails, it's also walking distance to Spensley Street Primary School, local cafes and village shops, Clifton Hill Station as well as easy freeway access. Location and potential - this is the one!
Insights: 78 Walker Street, Clifton Hill VIC 3068 was last sold in 2017 and 16 other 2 bedroom house in Clifton Hill have recently been sold.

Description:
Seamless Town Living
Perfectly positioned in one of Clifton Hills most sought after developments is this cleverly designed and immaculately presented townhouse boasting beautiful open living zones, stylish urban living and an easy low maintenance turn key lifestyle.
An inviting courtyard entrance leads inside to the spacious entrance area with vast picture window, the ground floor enjoys two perfectly proportioned robed bedrooms with the master featuring a stylish ensuite with ample storage space, pristine main bathroom, European style laundry plus internal access to the remote garage with additional extra storage space.
Upstairs offers a gourmet kitchen boasting stunning stone bench tops, stainless steel appliances, gas cooking and breakfast bar, open meals area continues through the breathtaking living zone and continues out to a large balcony area creating seamless indoor/outdoor living and making for the perfect entertaining area all year-round.
Only minutes walk-away to Clifton Hill Train Station and Dights Falls, easy access to the booming Smith Street shopping precinct, Abbotsford Convent, the well renowned gourmet delights of Victoria Street and ofcourse easy accessibility to the Melbourne CBD. This town residence is truly a perfect combination of effortless living in a very central locale.
Insights: 3 Reillys Way, Clifton Hill VIC 3068 was last sold in 2017 and 16 other 2 bedroom house in Clifton Hill have recently been sold.

Description:
Striking Architect Designed Executive Residence
A brand new house in an historic locale could not have been done any better than this compelling residence from Melbourne's in-demand innovators, Nixon Tulloch Fortey Architecture. The benchmark has been reset and the results are stunning! A designer sanctuary integrating multiple alfresco areas and rear remote-control garage; space and light weave their way in stylish unison throughout this brilliantly appointed, two-level home featuring three beautiful bedrooms (both down/up with ensuites; main includes freestanding bath plus balcony views) and lounge/study (or 4th). Enjoying village convenience near vast parklands/trails, cafes, shops, schools and train station, this superbly constructed home includes living room (gas log fireplace) with vanishing stack-slide door to secluded entertainment oasis, dining area with studio lighting, streamlined Smeg stone kitchen (clever storage, fridge/freezer), three smart bathrooms, powder room, laundry, double-glazed windows, heating/cooling, security/data systems hub, Spotted Gum floorboards, copious custom storage and landscaped courtyards.
Insights: 10 other 4 bedroom house in Clifton Hill have recently been sold.

Description:
'Coverdale c1880'
With only its second offering to the market in almost 100 years, this impressive double fronted brick Victorian strikes a commanding figure from the street resting upon an exceptionally rare parcel of land in Melbourne's increasingly popular inner-north (861 sqm approx). Sympathetically updated to restore the home's period allure, you're immediately struck with a sense of space and grandeur from the wide hallway entrance, ornate ceilings, OFPs, Baltic Pine floors and high ceilings throughout. The expansive and light-filled home boasts a flexible floorplan that comprises 5 or 6 generously proportioned bedrooms with BIRs, an elegant formal sitting room with stunning marble OFP, a two-storey rear extension and a modern kitchen/meals area that flows onto the timber deck and deep, rear tree-filled garden with storage shed (ROW access), while the 2 upstairs bedrooms share a southeast facing return balcony with a spectacular treetop aspect and uninterrupted city skyline views. The home is completed by a large central bathroom with separate bathtub and double vanity, separate laundry with shower/WC, hydronic heating throughout, an abundance of storage (including extensive attic storage), c.10,000l water tanks, currently used for the washing machine, solar electricity and hot water and side-driveway with carport and additional OSP. In a position that enjoys the desired blend of an idyllic family lifestyle with inner-city convenience, the home is central to both Edinburgh and Darling gardens, Queens Parade and Smith Street trams, shops, cafes and bars, Collingwood and Fitzroy Pools, easy access to the Eastern Freeway and the CBD and many fine schools (including Clifton Hill Primary, St John's Primary, Fitzroy and Northcote High Schools).
Land size: Approx. 861 m2
Insights: 25 Hodgkinson Street, Clifton Hill VIC 3068 was last sold in 2017 and 1 other 5 bedroom house in Clifton Hill have recently been sold.

Description:
Enviable Darling Gardens Address
Clifton Hill's finest parkland position on prestigious South Terrace is the privileged setting for the remarkably affordable opportunity presented by this exceptional townhouse. Nestled peacefully to the rear of a coveted complex located directly opposite Darling Gardens, this tightly-held home is offered in immaculate condition including private courtyard garden, balcony and off-street parking on title. This blue chip city-fringe investment and outstanding low-maintenance home comprises 2 generous bedrooms (BIRs, city glimpses), living room, large kitchen/meals, pristine bathroom, powder room and laundry. Close to trains, buses and trams. Stroll to cafes, shops, schools, leisure centre
and pool.
Insights: 9/10 South Terrace, Clifton Hill VIC 3068 was last sold in 2017 and 16 other 2 bedroom house in Clifton Hill have recently been sold.

Description:
A FINE FENWICK OUTLOOK ...
Facing Fenwick Street and blessed with a delightful outlook onto majestic Plane trees this generously proportioned 2 bedroom 70's apartment is part of a select block of 6 and is ready to be enjoyed by an owner occupier who covets livability or an investor searching for rental return & capital growth.
This refurbished apartment features security intercom entry, 2 bedrooms with built in robes, spacious open plan living, updated kitchen/meals, tiled bathroom with laundry facilities and separate toilet.
With an off street car space on title and envied location, walking distance to the Clifton Hill Village, Queens Parade with its cafe culture & specialty shopping, a host of public transport options and the idyllic environs of Yarra River parkland this affordable abode is ideal to reside or rent.
Insights: 5/79 Heidelberg Rd, Clifton Hill VIC 3068 was last sold in 2017 and 21 other 2 bedroom unit in Clifton Hill have recently been sold.

Description:
An Exemplar of Excellence, Parkside Address
With an alluring street presence behind a wrought iron fence and classic tuck-pointed Hawthorn Brick Victorian faÃ§ade, this truly exceptional home features an impressive architectural addition whereby every conceivable aspect has been carefully considered from eco-efficiency and sustainability (sub-level 6,000l water tanks, double glazed/UV protective windows, multi layered insulation, low-watt Artemide light fittings throughout and solar hot water), its ergonomic and functional design, to its distinct yet subdued aesthetic boasting the highest quality finishes and materials throughout. The light-filled and immaculately presented interior comprises an expansive open plan living and dining room with fully imported German designed LEICHT kitchen and integrated Miele appliances (Qasair rangehood, stone bench tops) and custom cabinetry that opens through concertina doors to the north facing rear courtyard (automatic awning, storage shed), a formal sitting room with original OFP and attic storage, 4 generously proportioned bedrooms with BIRs (2 with shared ensuite, 1 with spectacular park aspect and city skyline views), gleaming central bathroom (floor-to-ceiling tiles, stone wet areas, Villeroy and Boch toilets) and Euro laundry. Enjoying an enviable lifestyle directly opposite Darling Gardens, the home boasts easy access to Clifton Hill train station, Queens Parade shops and trams taking you direct to Fitzroy/Collingwood/CBD, Westgarth Village cafes and cinema, the Eastern Freeway and several excellent schools. Features: Brushbox timber floors, hydronic heating, air-conditioning, ceiling fans, security system and keyless entry, concealed utility area and ROW.
Insights: 7 North Terrace, Clifton Hill VIC 3068 was last sold in 2017 and 10 other 4 bedroom house in Clifton Hill have recently been sold.

Description:
Modern & Manageable Near Merri Creek Parklands
Standing at The Esplanade end of the street only metres to Merri Creek parkland and trails, this outstanding modern residence combines quality craftsmanship and light-filled space on a compact north-facing rear block. Upper-level views of the park and the city add another layer of lifestyle appeal to this elegant recycled brick home that's owner-built with attention to detail, Mountain Ash staircase and remote-control garage with workshop. Stroll to village cafes, primary school and train station from this character-rich home only minutes from the city that's superbly designed for low-maintenance enjoyment. Includes three bedrooms (or two huge suites and study) bright open-plan living and dining with bifold doors to entertainers' courtyard (retractable awning), fabulous kitchen with stainless-steel appliances, bath (spa) and powder rooms, separate laundry, heating/cooling plus balconies with views. On own Title.
Insights: 96 O'Grady Street, Clifton Hill VIC 3068 was last sold in 2017 and 25 other 3 bedroom house in Clifton Hill have recently been sold.

Description:
Modern Living In Proud Period Warehouse
A former heritage warehouse now designer abode, the contemporary style on offer with an industrial edge captures the essence of inner city living. Features: 2 double bedrooms, studio/guest room, refurbished sparkling bathroom, large open plan living zone with timber flooring throughout, kitchen with gas cooking and dishwasher, north facing windows and euro laundry. Adding to the allure of the home are warehouse features including high ceilings upon entry, original windows, triple brick walls and exposed beams. A walkable location close to many different local cafes, Merri Creek Trail, Yarra River, Clifton Hill Train Station and Darling gardens. Nelson Alexander Pty Ltd

Description:
PRIME POSITION, PURE POTENTIAL!
An exceptional opportunity to secure your future in the heart of Clifton Hill, this timeless terrace provides all the necessary ingredients for an inspired renovation and extension (STCA). Beyond its classic facade, the home's current floorplan comprises two generous bedrooms and wide central lounge (all with fireplaces), dining area, kitchen and bathroom. Features include gas log fire and split-system a/c, high ornate ceilings and original solid timber floors, plus a private backyard with two impressively large palm trees, handy storage shed and ROW potential. Situated in one of inner-Melbourne's most sought-after neighbourhoods, it's close to Clifton Hill Station, Quarries Park, Merri Creek/Capital City trail, Spensley Street Primary School, Queens Parade shops and cafes.

Description:
Substantial Inner-City Family Space & Scope
A much bigger than expected backyard plus plenty of flexible accommodation and a garage will ensure there are smiles all round as this double-fronted Edwardian is ready for a family to make it their own. Tucked away at the Yarra River and city-end of the village; generational change is in the air as this charming three bedroom home kept comfortable by the one owners for almost 30 years is brimming with potential to add some contemporary style, cutting-edge quality and considerable value. Stroll to cafes, schools, Darling Gardens, Main Yarra Trail and train station from this appealing home including wide hallway, high ceilings, Baltic pine floorboards, living room, dining room, 4th bedroom/study or home office, classic kitchen, central bathroom, laundry, covered alfresco area, rainwater tank, shared driveway on title and secluded flowering garden filled with sunshine.
Land Size: 450sqm approx.

Description:
Charming Cottage near Parkland
Perfect street presence with picturesque garden and period grace provides a warm invitation to the low-maintenance lifestyle allure of this delightful Edwardian cottage. Set on a compact block emphasizing easy alfresco entertaining; enjoy village convenience only minutes to the city by rail or trail and seconds to cafes, shops and vast parkland. Includes fretted hall, 2 double bedrooms (main with WIR), superb living room (gas log fireplace), light-filled kitchen and meals area opening to north-facing deck, beautiful central bathroom, separate laundry, large attic, ample storage, ducted heating, air-conditioning, alarm, polished Baltic floors. Land: Irregular 205sqm (approx).
Insights: 54 Dwyer Street, Clifton Hill VIC 3068 was last sold in 2018 and 16 other 2 bedroom house in Clifton Hill have recently been sold.

Description:
Generous Proportions Await Inside
Reserving its page in local history as the original Brown's Bakery, this sensational 19th century Hawthorn Brick residence boasts the kind of generously proportioned rooms and high ceilings that maximise the sense of space and natural light, right in the heart of Melbourne's inner-north. With a dual street frontage (Walker Street), the home comprises an exceptionally large formal living and dining room with floor-to-ceiling north facing window and OFP, modern kitchen (stone bench tops, Smeg dishwasher) with meals and informal living that open onto the large leafy rear courtyard (B/I gas BBQ, double-storey storage cavity) and separate laundry with shower and WC while upstairs hosts 3 generously proportioned bedrooms (two with original OFPs) and a central bathroom. Located in a position that combines an idyllic family lifestyle with inner-city convenience, the home is just a short stroll from Cafe Quince and Clifton Hill train station at the end of the street, Queens Parade trams and shops, popular Westgarth Village cafes and cinema, several recreational areas including Yarra Bend Park, Merri Creek Trail, Darling Gardens, Collingwood Leisure Centre and Mayors Park Tennis Centre, easy access to the Eastern Freeway and many fine schools. Features: ducted heating and air-conditioning, slate floors, remote OSP via Walker Street.
Insights: 117 Spensley Street, Clifton Hill VIC 3068 was last sold in 2017 and 25 other 3 bedroom house in Clifton Hill have recently been sold.

Description:
First-Class Contemporary Refinement
An inspired stamp of luxury and class defines every space and every detail of this stunning architect-enhanced, two-level Victorian. A revelation of remarkable craftsmanship and high-end quality, this brilliant contemporary residence takes a coveted village lifestyle to incomparable heights of sophistication, functionality and aesthetic style moments to Yarra Bend Park-Merri Creek trail, Queens Parade cafes, schools and Clifton Hill station. Inner-city convenience is confidently matched by highlights including three fitted bedrooms (main retreat with vaulted ceilings, bespoke WIR, excellent ensuite and study workstation), dining area with French doors to alfresco terrace, outstanding living room (HeatnGlo, custom storage) with stack-slide doors to landscaped garden and entertainment area, premium Peperino stone kitchen with Bertazzoni stove, two bathrooms, laundry/drying cupboard, hydronic heating, air conditioning, double-glazing, American Oak floors, remote-control alarm/intercom, Niles speakers (int & ext), Artemide lighting, solar hotwater, attic storage and rear ROW.
Insights: 55 Dwyer Street, Clifton Hill VIC 3068 was last sold in 2017 and 25 other 3 bedroom house in Clifton Hill have recently been sold.

Features include security intercom entry, spacious lounge with split system heating/cooling, floating timber floor, gorgeous kitchen with stainless steel upright cooker & breakfast bench, huge bedroom with robes, tiled bathroom with laundry facilities and undercover car space on title that can be accessed from Oâ€™Grady Street or Heidelberg Road.
Live in or rent out, either way itâ€™s a great opportunity!
